question:
The provisions regarding appointments / elections of which of the following are found in the constitution of India?
  1. Deputy Chairman of Rajya Sabha
  2. Lok Sabha Secretary
  3. Solicitor General of India
  4. Advocate General
  5. Chairman of UPSC
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Regarding Lok Sabha secretary, please note that constitution only talks about the secretarial staff via Article 98. 98. (1) Each House of Parliament shall have a separate secretarial staff: Provided that nothing in this clause shall be construed as preventing the creation of posts common to both Houses of Parliament. Correct answer would be 1 & 4.
